mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM USER_INFO ui JOIN CART c ON ui.USER_NO = c.USER_NO JOIN ORDER_INFO oi ON oi.CART_NO =c.CART_NO WHERE ui.user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_phonenum FROM USER_INFO ui WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT OI.order_no, BI.bakery_name, P.amount, PS.pickup_status, R.review_detail, R.review_rating, LISTAGG(M.menu_name || ' x ' || CI.menu_count, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY M.menu_no) AS menu_list FROM ORDER_INFO OI JOIN CART C ON OI.cart_no = C.cart_no JOIN USER_INFO U ON C.user_no = U.user_no JOIN PAYMENT P ON OI.pay_no = P.pay_no JOIN PICKUP_STATUS PS ON P.pay_no = PS.pay_no LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON OI.order_no = R.order_no JOIN CART_INFO CI ON C.cart_no = CI.cart_no JOIN MENU M ON CI.menu_no = M.menu_no JOIN BAKERY_INFO BI ON M.bakery_no = BI.bakery_no WHERE U.user_no = #{userNo} GROUP BY OI.order_no, BI.bakery_name, P.amount, PS.pickup_status, R.review_detail, R.review_rating ORDER BY OI.order_no DESC

SELECT bi.BAKERY_NO, bi.BAKERY_NAME, bi.BAKERY_ADDRESS, bi.BAKERY_PHONE, ba.AGREE, bd.SUBMISSION_DATE FROM BAKERY_INFO bi JOIN BAKERY_ACCESS ba ON bi.BAKERY_NO =ba.BAKERY_NO JOIN BAKERY_DETAIL bd ON bi.BAKERY_NO = bd.BAKERY_NO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNum}
SELECT user_name AS userName, ui.USER_PHONENUM AS userPhone, b.USER_BUSINESSNO AS businessNo FROM USER_INFO ui JOIN BUSINESSNO b ON ui.USER_NO = b.USER_NO WHERE ui.USER_NO = ${userNum}
